I m continuing visiting him till now. ** ** **** **** *** **** ** ***** * I m so much grateful to him . I have no words to pay my gratitude towards him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I have a condition called hypertrophic cardiomyopathy, which wasn't attended for 15 years due to my carelessness.
Lately I was experiencing some pain in chest and hence visited the Dr.
Dr is very patient and an active listener, he did detailed analysis and investigation, so right now I am at a diagnostic stage but am sure that once my treatment starts, I'll be better in no time.
Somehow trust comes naturally with the Dr.********* ** ** * **** ****** *** a fabulous human being.
